bt.net

Class SharedSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.channels.Selector
      • bt.net.SharedSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class SharedSelector
extends Selector
    Selector decorator with some convenient extensions, like wakeupAndRegister(SelectableChannel, int, Object).
    Since:
    1.5
